component.name: Besta RTOS SDK Extension
component.summary: Besta RTOS toolchain and support libraries

description.p: This SDK extension simplifies Besta RTOS applet development through Flatpak IDEs. Add FLATPAK_ENABLE_SDK_EXT=muteki to a Flatpak IDE's environment variable to get started.
Turn on optimization for muteki-shims and mutekix, and build another copy of muteki-shims that is used exclusively for building newlib.
Package besta-tools so IDEs can output final applet executables without the help from a more complete SDK installation outside Flatpak.
